price: “Mu by’ukuri twahishuriwe ko ibihano bizaba ku wahinyuye akanatera umugongo (amategeko ya Allah).”
arabic: إِنَّا قَدۡ أُوحِيَ إِلَيۡنَآ أَنَّ ٱلۡعَذَابَ عَلَىٰ مَن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: innā qad ūḥiya ilaynā anna al-ʿadhāba ʿalā man kadhaba watawallā
